name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donald Trump Is An Actual Circus Clown

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of the name 'Donald Trump' with the text 'A Circus Clown'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple javascript search-and-replace that swaps various permutations of the name "Donald Trump" with the text "A Circus Clown". Designed to hopefully eliminate some of the fatigue inherent to browsing the internet during these trying times.
